00073 void CameraController::RotateCamera(float dx, float dy)
00074 {
00075         if (!m_bIsRotating) m_bIsRotating = true;
00076 
00077         m_fRotateZ += dy*0.01;
00078         m_fRotateY += dx*0.01;
00079 
00080         if (m_fRotateZ >= 1.56) 
00081                 m_fRotateZ = 1.56f;
00082         else if (m_fRotateZ <= -1.56) 
00083                 m_fRotateZ = -1.56f;
00084 
00085         NiMatrix3 rotation =  m_spCamera->GetParent()->GetWorldRotate();
00086         NiMatrix3 newRot;
00087         newRot.FromEulerAnglesYZX(m_fRotateY,m_fRotateZ,0.0);
00088         rotation = newRot*rotation;
00089         NiPoint3 heading;
00090         rotation.GetCol(0, heading);
00091         m_vTarget = m_spCamera->GetParent()->GetWorldTranslate() - heading*m_fcDistanceFromTarget;
00092         
00093 }

00110 void CameraController::UpdatePositionAndOrientation()
00111 {    
00112         // get the camera's parent node
00113         NiNodePtr m_spTarget = m_spCamera->GetParent();
00114         // get the parent's rotation matrix
00115         NiMatrix3 rotation = m_spTarget->GetWorldRotate();
00116         // find the local heading vector
00117         NiPoint3 heading;
00118         rotation.GetCol(0, heading);
00119         // position the target behind the parent
00120         NiPoint3 targetPosition = m_spTarget->GetWorldTranslate() - heading*m_fcDistanceFromTarget;
00121 
00122         // if the camera is not rotated by user input then update the
00123         // current target
00124         if (!m_bIsRotating) 
00125         {
00126                 m_vTarget = targetPosition;
00127         }
00128 
00129         // find the distance between the target and the camera
00130         NiPoint3 distance =  (m_vTarget - m_vPosition);
00131         // update the camera's velocity using a mass-spring controller
00132         m_spVelController->Update(m_vVelocity, distance);
00133         // integrate position
00134         m_vPosition = m_vPosition + m_vVelocity * m_fDeltaTime;
00135         // set new position
00136         m_spCamera->SetWorldTranslate(m_vPosition);
00137         // set orientation (look at parent)
00138         NiMatrix3 newRotation = NiViewMath::LookAt(m_spTarget->GetWorldTranslate(), m_vPosition, NiPoint3(0.0, 1.0, 0.0));
00139         m_spCamera->SetWorldRotate(newRotation);                
00140 }
